event.title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting - January 2018
event.description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: Registration for this event is via an external ticketing system here: https://ti.to/bristol-data-scientists/january-2018

Please join us at the first Bristol Data Scientists Meetup of 2018 for three great presentations and networking drinks!

We're also happy to announce the first pre-meeting workshop!

Pre-meeting workshop:
3:00pm: A Beginners Guide to Data Science
Aimée Gott, Mango Solutions

Agenda:
6:00pm: Arrival and drinks
6:30pm: Presentations (followed by networking and drinks)
• Speaker #1: Deep Neural Network Training and Applications - Tim Wong, Centrica
• Speaker #2: Data Science at Dyson - Dan Erben, Dyson
• Speaker #3: Data science to improve your life - Laura Collett, Bristol Clinical Trials Unit at BRI

Join us on Twitter with the Bristol Data Scientists hashtag: #BristolDS
